description:
Nagisa is torn between helping her friend, Yui to find a present for Fuji P’s birthday, and finding a way to express her own feelings to Fuji P.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Extremely Shaken Up! My Feelings for Fuji P
Gekiure Makuri! Fuji P-senpai ni Todoke Kono Omoi
หัวใจสั่นไหว ส่งความรู้สึกไปให้รุ่นพี่ฟูจิพี
激揺れまくり! 藤P先輩に届けこの想い
